answer: Based on the provided context, SemCor3.0 is a training corpus manually annotated with WordNet sense for Word Sense Disambiguation (WSD). While it is the largest corpus annotated with WordNet sense for WSD, it is not explicitly stated whether SemCor3.0 is reflective of English language data in general. Additional information would be needed to determine if SemCor3.0 can be considered representative of English language data as a whole.
